name: FillUp!
description:
Idea

Logic turn-based board game with uncontrolled explosions and sharp turns in the gameplay.

Description

FillUp is a tabletop turn-based logic competitive online game for 2 to 4 players. This cross platform game for Android, iOS, Windows and Linux. Only Android and Windows are available as for right now.
Now our project is in pre-alpha and provides a working core of the gameplay, namely:

  • The ability to connect to the server and search for a game
  • Online and offline modes
  • Playing with other players and earn rewards
  • Model of interaction with other players (sending emojis in match)
  • Of course, the explosive gameplay itself
  • And much more 

To find opponents or follow up-to-date news, visit our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/gEb8WErxSr
